root_reason_details: The calculation logic for the due date display was incorrect.
The date difference function used the system's local date instead of the server date.
The local date was hardcoded into the billing module due to a previous quick-fix for a timezone issue.
A quick-fix solution was implemented without thorough testing.
There was a tight deadline for a minor release, and the fix was deemed low-risk.
The risk of the fix was underestimated due to lack of a comprehensive testing framework and insufficient code review processes.
